means: （使）发怒，激怒( anger的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The king's indulgence towards his sons angered the business community.
sentence.Network_cn: 国王对儿子们的纵容令商界恼火。

sentence.Network_en: The decision to allow more offshore oil drilling angered some Californians.
sentence.Network_cn: 允许进行更多近海石油钻探的决定激怒了一些加利福尼亚人。

sentence.Network_en: The bank's staff were already angered by a meagre 3.1% pay rise.
sentence.Network_cn: 银行职员对只加薪3.1%已心生怒火。

PerfectNetExp.abs: we appear to have angered it ., 我们似乎惹火它了.
It has hit a nerve among many Chinese angered by high - handed behavior among government officials ., 这也触动了许多中国人对政府官员为所欲为的强烈愤慨.
this so angered us that we beat him up ., 这使我们气愤得把他痛打了一顿.

list.abs: 公亩 English, 翻译,... ... 公吨 ton;metric ton 公愤 popular indignation;public anger 公府 government post in Han dynasty.
含,含字的解释,查字典 ... 含量[ content] 含怒[ in anger] 含情[ full of tenderness].
2011-05-19 电影《愤怒管理》（anger management）中的插曲叫什么名字 1 2011-05-06 东莞阳光教育频道能看东莞市家庭教育电影 …
斯蒂芬 - DVD影音宅急便 ... 国家秘密第一季( Secret State) 愤怒的管理营第一季 Anger Management 艾希曼/ Eichmann.
andre polynomial 安得列多项式anger function 安格尔函数angle 角

entry.def: Anger is the strong emotion that you feel when you think that someone has behaved in an unfair, cruel, or unacceptable way.

example.ex: He cried with anger and frustration...
example.tran: 他愤怒而又沮丧得哭了起来。

example.ex: Ellen felt both despair and anger at her mother.
example.tran: 埃伦对她的母亲感到既绝望又生气。

entry.def: If something angers you, it makes you feel angry.

example.ex: The decision to allow more offshore oil drilling angered some Californians.
example.tran: 允许进行更多近海石油钻探的决定激怒了一些加利福尼亚人。

sentences.sentence: "infuriated onlookers charged the police who were beating the boy"

auth_sentence.content: The proposed job swap also has angered many Russians.

auth_sentence.content: The plan, however, has angered rights groups.
auth_sentence.res_content: The plan, however, has angered rights groups.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The plan, however, has angered rights groups.

auth_sentence.content: You angered the hive and now you are being stung.
auth_sentence.res_content: You angered the hive and now you are being stung.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You angered the hive and now you are being stung.
